title: Handle a Diminished Value Claim
description: A third-party claimant is demanding payment for the diminished value of their vehicle after it was repaired following an accident with your insured.

tasks.description: Receive the diminished value claim from the third party.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster logs the new demand in the claim file.

tasks.description: Review the state's laws regarding diminished value claims.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster confirms that diminished value claims are permissible in the relevant state.

tasks.description: Analyze the claim and make a reasonable settlement offer based on the vehicle's type, age, and damage severity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster analyzes the case and makes a settlement offer, which may be less than the original demand.
